### Biography
Christian A. Cobos is a student of Mathematics with Statistics emphasis at California State University Channel Islands. He is currently taking courses in Probability and Statistics, and he is expected to graduate in the Fall 2023. 

He has some experience in quality control statistical analysis using Minitab. He has some experience programming with R and Matlab. Christian has worked in the Automotive and Aerospace industry and is familiar with the quality standards of both areas.  

Christian Cobos' interests are statistical modeling and data analysis. His goal is to work in a learning and challenging environment utilizing his skills and knowledge to contribute positively to his personal growth and the growth of an organization.
